Verses: 1 yoodhaavin Raajaavaagiya Yosabaadh, Erusalemilulla Than Veettirku Samaadhaanaththode Thirumbivandhaan.

2 appozhudhu Anaaniyin Kumaaranaagiya Yegoo Ennum Gnaanadhrushtikkaaran Purappattu, Avanai Sandhiththu, Raajaavaagiya Yosabaaththai Nokki: Dhunmaarkkanukkuth Thunainindru, Karththaraip Pagaikkiravargalai Neer Snegikkalaamaa? Idhinimiththam Karththarudaiya Kadunkobam Ummel Vara Irundhadhu.
3 aagilum Neer Vikkiragaththoppugalai Dhesaththai Vittagatri, Dhevanaith Theda Ummudaiya Irudhayaththai Neraakkina Vishayaththil Nanmaiyaana Kaariyangal Ummidaththile Kaanappattadhu Undu Endraan.

4 yosabaadh Erusalemile Vaasamaayirundhu, Thirumbap Peyarsebaathodangi, Eppiraayeem Malaiththesamattumulla Janaththirkulle Prayaanamaaippoi, Avargalaith Thangal Pidhaakkaludaiya Dhevanaagiya Karththar Idaththirkuth Thirumbappanninaan.
5 avan Yoodhaavin Aranaana Pattanangalaagiya Ovvoru Pattanaththilum Nyaayaadhipadhigalai Vaiththu,

6 andha Nyaayaadhipadhigalai Nokki: Neengal Seygira Kaariyaththaikkuriththu Echcharikkaiyaayirungal; Neengal Manushanudaiya Kattalaiyinaal Alla, Karththarudaiyakattalaiyinaal Nyaayam Visaarikkireergal; Nyaayam Visaarikkira Vishayaththile Avar Ungaludane Irukkiraar.

7 aadhalaal Karththarukku Bayappadugira Bayam Ungalidaththil Irukkakkadavadhu, Echcharikkaiyaayirundhu Kaariyaththai Nadaththungal; Ungal Dhevanaagiyakarththaridaththile Aniyaayamum Mugadhaatchiniyamumillai, Paridhaanamum Avaridaththile Sellaadhu Endraan.

8 avargal Erusalemil Vandhirukkumpodhu, Yosabaadh Leviyarilum, Aasaariyarilum, Israveludaiya Vamsaththalaivarilum, Silaraik Karththarudaiyanyaayangalaik Kuriththum Vivaadhavishayangalaikkuriththum Visaarikkumpadi Erusalemile Niyamiththu,
9 avargalukkuk Kattalaiyittadhaavadhu: Neengal Karththarukku Bayandhu, Unmaiyodum Uththama Irudhayaththodum Nadandhu Seyyavendiyadhu Ennavendraal,

10 naanaavidha Raththappazhi Sangadhigalum, Pramaanaththirkum, Karpanaikkum, Kattalaigalukkum, Nyaayangalukkum Aduththa Naanaavidha Vazhakku Sangadhigalum, Thangal Pattanangalile Kudiyirukkira Ungal Sagodhararidaththilirundhu Ungalidaththil Varumpodhu, Avargal Karththarukku Nerastharaagaadhapadikkum, Ungalmelum Ungal Sagodhararmelum Kadunkobam Varaadhapadikkum, Neengal Avargalai Echchariyungal; Neengal Ippadi Seydhaal Nerastharaagamaatteergal.

11 idho, Aasaariyanaagiya Amariyaa Karththarukkaduththa Ellaa Nyaayaththilum, Ismavelin Kumaaranaagiya Sepadhiyaa Ennum Yoodhaa Vamsaththin Thalaivan Raajaavukkaduththa Ellaa Nyaayaththilum Ungalukku Melaana Nyaayaadhipadhigal; Leviyarum Ungal Kaikkul Uththiyogastharaayirukkiraargal; Neengal Thidamanadhaayirundhu Kaariyangalai Nadaththungal, Uththamanukkuk Karththar Thunai Endraan.
